attributes.action: All carers should be paid for the work we do , we work 24/7 365 days and are expected to live on a pittence. It's time the govenment paid all carers whatever the relationship, and it should not be means tested.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We carers provide a loving and caring service we do it for love and are often not supported. The govenment are saving millions per year by not having these people in care homes and don't want to give anything to carers.  We are told to provide care free. It's time the govenment paid all carers and the money should not be means tested. All carers should get £50 per week for caring full time. Where else would people work all the hours we do for nothing.
